description: With cushioning on the entire bottom of the foot, the Performance Hike Light Cushion Micro Stripe Crew offers comfort just where you need it when you hit your next trail. These responsibly sourced, ZQ-Certified Merino wool socks feature Indestructawool™ technology, which reinforces that internal soft wool with external nylon strength. With body-mapped mesh zones in just the right spots, these socks will have your feet feeling comfortable, from the first mile to the last.
name: Smartwool Performance Hike Light Cushion Micro Stripe Crew Socks - Mens
